job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We are growing rapidly and we are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to help us analyze data and create and deploy tools utilizing both high-level ML models and deep learning methods and approaches. We leverage these tools to create bots that learn how to navigate and explore mobile apps. These bots can be tuned to hunt for OS crashes/software bugs, check the app for usability issues, or simply learn how to use the app like a normal human user would. We are looking for creative-thinking AI experts that can help us innovate the world of testing with the latest advances in AI.
